Quizzly

In House Design

Quizzly is a market research platform for the medical community. Quizzly needed an administrator portal to collect profiling data. The tool also allows admins to create group/attribute pairs and questions targeted to specific specialties and countries. In addition, the portal has reporting to show fill rates per question.

View Case Study

Twine Health Site Redesign

In House Design

Background & Objective

The overarching goal was to make the site more consumer friendly. I designed 6 layouts, totaling 8 pages. The kicker is I had to do all this in one week.

View Project

Solstice Initiative

Idea Hack At Startup Institute

I participated in a 24-hour hackathon for Solstice Initiative, which aims to provide solar for every American. Solstice Initiative tasked us to build a platform to create stickiness with its users. Startup Institute helps individuals build their soft and hard skills, helping them to find a career they love while doing work that matters.

View Project

Joshua Litchfield

Senior Product Designer

I prefer my workplace to be a design-centric firm that focuses on team, process, learning, and building really great products and experiences. I want these philosophies to be inherent in everything we do.
